_header: The feast of the Trinity of great honour it is
_description: The Feast of the Trinity in one MS of the South English Legendary

BLEge2810.First Lines: Þe feste of þe trinite of gret honour hit isac þeȝ ich nelle þer of noȝt moche speke ywis…
BLEge2810.Last Lines: …þer uor bidde we him þat on & þre isþat we mote þurȝ riȝt bileue com to heuene blis
